title: Why the 2020 Olympics Refuse to Accept the Inevitable - The Ringer
description: Why the 2020 Olympics Refuse to Accept the Inevitable The Ringer Coronavirus: Canada refuses to send athletes to Tokyo Olympics unless Games postponed Global News Canada’s decision to pull out of the Olympics is to our collective credit The Globe and Mail Can…
content: I keep not booking my plane ticket to Tokyo to cover the Olympics Its the only thing on my to do list and its big I learned that I was credentialed for the Games a few weeks ago completing a professional goal I set for myself on the night of the clos chars
